content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, glad to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am sure you will find the location of the apartment in the city center quite convenient. What is the rental price you are considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am interested in the apartment, and I think the location is very good. Could you tell me what the lowest price you can offer is for the apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mister Wang. I am glad to hear that you find the location of the apartment favorable. As I mentioned before, I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Therefore, I cannot offer you a lower price than 1000 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, I am looking to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Could you consider a price of 800 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mister Wang, but 800 Euro per month is too low for me. As I said before, I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible, and 800 Euro per month is not acceptable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. Since we are unable to agree on a price at this time, I will consider other options. Thank you for showing me the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your time as well, Mister Wang. I hope you find a suitable apartment that meets your needs and budget. Let's terminate our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
